Translations.Text: Alipha. Lama. Ro ya (allahacya) granthacya ayati aheta ani spasta asa kura'anacya
Asihi vela ye'ila jevha inkara karanare apalya imanadharaka honyaci iccha karatila
Tumhi tyanna khanyata, labha ucalanyata ani (khotya) apeksa balaganyata magna asalele soda. Te svatah lavakaraca januna ghetila
Ani konatyahi vastila amhi nasta kele nahi, parantu he ki ticyakarita niscita ase likhita hote
Konatahi janasamuha apalya mrtyupasuna na pudhe ja'u sakato, na mage rahu sakato
Ani te mhanale, he manasa! Jyavara kura'ana avatarita kele gele ahe niscitaca tu ekhada veda ahe
Jara tu agadi sacca ahe tara maga amacyajavala pharistyanna ka nahi anata
Amhi pharistyanna satyasahaca avatarita karato. Ani asa veli tyanna savada dili jata nahi
Nihsansaya amhica ya kura'anala avatarita kele ahe ani amhica tyace sanraksaka ahota
Ani amhi tumacyapurvi ho'una gelelya janasamuhammadhyehi apale paigambara pathavita rahilo
Ani (tathapi) jo paigambaradekhila tyancyajavala ala, tyaci te thattaca udavita rahile
Aparadhi lokancya manata amhi asaca prakare heca racata asato
Te yacyavara imana rakhata nahi ani nihsansaya purvicya lokanci hica pad'dhata rahili ahe
Ani jara amhi tyancyasathi akasata (janyaca) daravajahi ughaduna dila ani te tithe cadhuhi lagale
Tarihi heca mhanatila ki amaci najarabandi keli geli ahe, kimbahuna amacyavara jadutona kela gela ahe
Ani nihsansaya, amhi akasata buruja (rasi) banavile aheta ani pahanaryankarita yala susobhita kele ahe
Ani dhihkkaralelya pratyeka saitanapasuna yala suraksita thevale ahe
Tathapi, jo lapuna chapuna aikanyaca prayatna karato, bhadakatya agica nikhara tyacya pathisi lagato
Ani jaminila amhi pasaravuna dile ahe ani ticyavara parvata thevale aheta ani ticyata pratyeka vastu amhi niscita pramanata ugavili ahe
Ani ticyataca amhi tumacya anna samugrici vyavastha keli ahe ani (tyancyasathihi) jyanna roji denare tumhi nahita
Ani jevadhya mhanuna cija-vastu aheta, tya sarvanca khajina amacyajavala ahe, ani amhi pratyeka vastu ticya nirdharita pramanata utaravito
Ani amhi vajanadara varyanna pathivato, maga akasatuna parjan'ya vrsti karuna tumhala trpta karato ani tumhi tyaca sangraha karuna thevanare nahita
Ani amhica jivana deto ani mrtyuhi deto ani (sevati) amhica varasa ahota
Ani tumacyapaiki pudhe janaryanna ani mage rahanaryannahi amhi cangalya prakare janato
Ani tumaca palanakarta samasta lokanna ekatrita karela. Nihsansaya to motha tattvadarsi, motha jnani ahe
Ani nihsansaya, amhi manavala khanakanarya (koradya) matipasuna, ji sadalelya garyaci hoti, nirmana kele ahe
Ani tyacyapurvi jinnanna amhi agnisikhepasuna nirmana kele
Ani jevha tumacya palanakartyane pharistyanna pharmavile ki mi eka manava, kalya sadalelya, khanakanarya matipasuna nirmana karanara ahe
Tara jevha mi tyala purna banavuna ghe'ina ani tyata apala atma phunkena tevha tumhi sarva tyala sajada kara (tyacyapudhe matha teka)
Yastava sarvacya sarva pharistyanni apala matha tekala
Parantu iblisane sajada karanaryammadhye samila honyasa inkara kela
(Allahane) pharmavile, he iblisa! Tula jhale tari kaya ki tu sajada karanaryammadhye samila jhala nahi
To mhanala, mi asa nahi ki ya manavala sajada karava, jyala tu kalya ani sadalelya khanakhananarya matipasuna nirmana kele ahe
(Allahane) pharmavile, ata tu jannatamadhuna calata ho karana tu dhihkkaralela ahesa
Ani tujhyavara kayamatacya divasaparyanta majhyatarphe dhihkkara ahe
To mhanala, he majhya palanakartya! Mala tya divasaparyanta sandhi pradana kara ki lokanna dusaryanda (jivanta karuna) uthavile ja'ila
Pharmavile, (thika ahe) tu tyancyapaiki ahesa, jyanna sandhi dili geli ahe
Tharalelya divasacya veleparyantaci

(Saitana) mhanala, he majhya palanakartya! Tu mala margabhrasta kelesa tara midekhila sapatha gheto ki mi sud'dha dharatita tyancyasathi moha maya nirmana karina ani tya sarvanna bahakavuna margabhrasta karina
Matra tujhya tya dasankherija, jyanna tu nivaduna ghetale ahe
Pharmavile, ho. Haca majhyaparyanta pohacanyaca sarala marga ahe
Majhya (nivadaka) dasanvara tujha konatahi prabhava padanara nahi, matra je vata cukalele loka aheta, teca tujhe anusarana karatila
Ani nihsansaya, tya sarvancya vayadyace sthana jahannama ahe
Jyala sata daravaje aheta. Pratyeka darasathi tyanca eka his'sa vibhajita ahe
Nihsansaya, allahace bhaya rakhuna duracarapasuna dura rahanare loka bagammadhye ani jharyam (pravaham) madhye asatila
(Tyanna sangitale ja'ila) salamati ani santipurvaka yata dakhala vha
Ani tyancya manata ji kahi vaira- dvesa bhavana hoti amhi ti sarva dura karu. Te bha'u-bha'u banuna ekamekansamora sinhasanavara basalele asatila
Tyanna tithe na ekhade duhkha sparsa karu sakate ani na te tithuna kadhi kadhale jatila
Majhya dasanna sanga ki mi motha mapha karanara ani khupa khupa daya karanara ahe
